Pošalji na online bazu podataka kasnije

section.name: Errors

entry.string: Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.

section.entry: Dogodila se greška prilikom spajanja na freedb server.

entry.string: Please fill all fields and track titles before submitting.

section.entry: Molim popuniti sva polja i trake prije slanja.

section.name: Query

entry.string: No freedb entry for this disk.

section.entry: Ne postoji freedb unos za ovaj disk.
Spajam se na freedb server na

entry.string: Select the entry that best fits your CD

section.entry: Izaberite unos koji najbolje odgovara vašem CD

entry.string: Would you like to perform this query again later?

section.entry: Da li želite provesti ovaj upit opet kasnije?

entry.string: Would you like to perform the remaining queries again later?

section.entry: Da li želite provesti preostale upit opet kasnije?

entry.string: Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.

section.entry: Dogodila se greška prilikom spajanja na freedb server.

section.entry: Osvježi listu zadataka sa ovim informacijama

entry.string: Select the folder in which the encoded files will be placed

section.entry: Izaberi mapu u koju će enkodirana datoteka biti spremljena

entry.string: Use input file folder if possible

section.entry: Koristi mapu ulazne datoteke ako je moguće

entry.string: Append sequential numbers to otherwise identical filenames

section.entry: Dodaj slijedne brojeve identičnim imenima datoteka

entry.string: Keep time stamps of source files

section.name: Errors

entry.string: The output folder does not exist! Do you want to create it?

section.entry: Izlazna mapa nepostoji! Želite li je stvoriti?

section.name: Playlists

entry.string: Select the folder in which the playlist files will be placed

section.entry: Izaberi mapu u koju će se smjestiti playlista

entry.string: Create only a single playlist and/or cue sheet file per conversion

section.entry: Načini samo jednu playlistu/listu po konverziji

entry.string: Select the folder of the CDDB database

section.name: Errors

entry.string: Please enter a valid eMail address.

The freedb CDDBP protocol cannot be used over HTTP Forward proxies!
Would you like to change the protocol to HTTP?

section.entry:
freedb CDDB protokol se ne može koristiti preko HTTP proslijeđenih Proxya!
Želite li promijeniti protokol na HTTP?

section.name: Tags

entry.string: Replace existing comments with default comment
Add reference to audio file tag
Read cue sheets embedded in metadata

section.entry: Učitaj liste sadržane u meta podacima

entry.string: Prefer cue sheets over chapter information
Prepend zero to track numbers below 10

section.entry: Predmetni nulu trakama rednog broja manjeg od 10

section.name: Verification

entry.string: Verify that lossless inputs decode to exactly the data they were originally created from.

section.entry: Provjeri da je lossless ulaz dekodiran točno u podatke iz kojih je originalno kreiran

entry.string: Verify that lossless outputs decode to exactly the data used when encoding them.

section.entry: Provjeri da je lossless izlaz dekodiran točno u podatke korištene za enkodiranje

entry.string: Conversion to a single output file
Treat the combined tracks like a single track

section.name: About

entry.string: This program is being distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL).

section.entry: Ovaj program distribuiran je pod uvjetima GNU General Public Licence (GPL).

section.name: Updates

entry.string: There are new updates for %1 available online! Would you like to see a list of available updates now?

section.entry: Postoji nova nadogradnja za %1 dostupna putem interneta! Želite li vidjeti listu novih nadogradnji sada?

entry.string: There are no updates available at the moment!

%1 can perform an automatic check for online program updates at startup.
Would you like %1 to look for updates at startup?

section.entry:
%1 može automatski provjeriti za update programa prilikom startanja.
Želite li da %1 potraži update prilikom startanja?

section.name: Messages

entry.string: A conversion process is still active! Do you really want to quit?

section.entry: Enkodiranje u tijeku! Da li zaista želite prekinuti?

entry.string:
This option will remove the original files from your computer after the encoding process!
Are you sure you want to activate this function?

section.entry:
Ova opcija izbrisat će originalnu datoteku sa vašeg računala nakon što enkodiranje završi!
Da li ste sigurni da želite aktivirati ovu funkciju?

entry.string: Keep this option enabled even after restarting %1

section.entry: Opcija aktivna i nakon ponovnog pokretanja %1

entry.string: The output file %1 already exists! Do you want to overwrite it?

section.entry: Izlazna datoteka %1 već postoji! Želite li je prepisati?

entry.string:
You seem to be converting from a lossy to a lossless format.
Please be aware that quality loss cannot be undone, so this process will not improve quality in any way, and most likely increase file size.
Would you like to continue anyway?

section.entry:
Čini se da pretvarate iz lossy formata u lossless format.
Gubitak kvalitete ne može se poništiti, tako da ovaj postupak neće poboljšati kvalitetu ni na koji način i vjerojatno će povećati veličinu datoteke.
Želite li ipak nastaviti?

section.name: Errors

entry.string:
Could not create decoder component: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Dekoder komponenta nije kreirana: %1
Datoteka: %1 Staza: %2

entry.string:
Could not set up decoder for input file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2
Error: %3

section.entry:
Ne mogu izabrati dekoder za ulaznu datoteku: %1
Datoteka: %1 Staza: %2

entry.string:
Could not set up encoder for output file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2
Error: %3

section.entry:
Ne mogu postaviti enkoder za izlaznu datoteku: %1
Datoteka: %1 Staza: %2

entry.string:
Could not set up DSP processor: %1
Error: %2

section.entry:
Ne mogu postaviti DSP obradu: %1
Greška: %2

entry.string:
Unable to access input file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Ne mogu pristupiti ulaznoj datoteci: %1
Datoteka: %1 Mapa: %2

entry.string:
Unable to create output file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Ne mogu kreirati izlaznu datoteku: %1
Datoteka: %1 Mapa: %2

entry.string:
Checksum mismatch verifying output file: %1
Encode checksum: %2 Verify checksum: %3

section.entry:
Nepodudaranje kontrolnog zbroja izlazne datoteke; %1
Kontrolni zbroj enkodiranja: %2 Kontrolni zbroj provjera: %3

entry.string: Unable to load NT SCSI drivers! CD ripping disabled!

section.entry: Ne mogu učitati NT SCSI driver! CD ripanje onemogućeno!

entry.string: Cannot play a CD track while ripping from the same drive!

section.entry: Ne mogu istovremeno svirati i ripati sa istog diska!

entry.string: Cannot start ripping while playing a track from the same drive!

section.entry: Ne mogu početi ripati dok sviram trake s istog diska!

entry.string: CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: CDDB podrška je onemogućena! Molim omogućite lokalnu ili remote CDDB podršku u postavkama.

entry.string: Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: Remote CDDB podrška je onemogućena! Molim omogućite remote CDDB u postavkama.

entry.string:
Access to CD-ROM drives was denied by Windows.
Please contact your system administrator in order to be granted the right to access the CD-ROM drive.

section.entry:
Pristup CD-ROMu je onemogućen od strane Windowsa.
Molim kontaktirajte svog sistem administratora kako bi vam povisio prava pristupa CD-ROM pogonu.

entry.string: The selected folder does not exist anymore!

section.name: Overwrite

entry.string: The following %1 files already exist or have duplicate file names

section.entry: Sljedećih %1 datoteka već postoji ili postoji istoimena datoteka

section.name: Format

entry.string: The selected tracks have different sample formats. Please select the desired sample format of the output file:

section.entry: Izabrane trake imaju različite sample formate. Molim izaberite željeni format izlazne datoteke:

section.name: Ripper

entry.string: Read ISRC when adding tracks to joblist

section.entry: Učitaj ISRC prilkom dodavanja traka na listu zadataka

section.name: CueSheet

entry.string: Prefer cue sheet metadata over referenced files' tags

section.entry: Radije metadata iz liste nego iz referenciranih tagova

entry.string: Look for compressed alternatives if referenced Wave files cannot be located

section.entry: Traži komprimirane alternative ako referencirana Wave datoteka ne može biti nađena

entry.string: Ignore errors during cue sheet processing

section.entry: Zanemari greške za vrijeme obrade listi

section.name: Quality

entry.string: Maximum AAC frequency bandwidth to use (Hz)

section.entry: Maksimalna AAC frekvencijska širina pojasa koja se koristi (Hz)

section.name: Format

entry.string: Allow ID3v2 tags in AAC files

section.entry: Dozvoli ID3v2 tagove u AAC datotekama

entry.string: Some players may have problems playing AAC files with ID3 tags attached. Please use this option only if you are sure that your player can handle these tags.

section.entry: Neki playeri mogu imati problema svirajući AAC datoteke s uključenim ID3 tagovima. Molimo koristite ovu opciju samo ako ste sigurni da vaš player podržava tagove.

section.name: Expert

entry.string: You can specify multiple functions separated by semicolons.

section.entry: Možete odrediti više funkcija odvojene sa točka zarezom.

section.name: WMA

entry.string: Automatically select format based on settings and input format

section.entry: Izaberi format automatski prema postavkama i ulaznom formatu

section.name: Errors

entry.string: Could not find suitable audio format.

section.entry: Ne mogu naći odgovarajući audio format.

entry.string: Unable to use selected audio format.

section.entry: Ne mogu koristiti izabrani audio format.

section.name: meh!

entry.string: Create a separate folder for each output format

section.entry: Kreiraj zasebnu mapu za svaki izlazni format

section.name: Donate

entry.string: Please help keep this software free by supporting the %1 project with a donation.

section.entry: Molim vas održite ovaj software besplatnim podržavajući %1 software donacijom.

entry.string: Please write to %1 if you would like to mail a check or send money by mail.

section.entry: Molim pišite na %1 ukoliko želite poslati ček ili novac poštom.

section.name: PayPal

entry.string: Choose an amount and click the button to make a donation with PayPal:

section.entry: Izaberite iznos i pritisnite gumb za donaciju putem PayPal-a:

entry.string: You can also send money directly to %1 with PayPal.

section.entry: Novac možete poslati direktno na %1 putem PayPal-a.

section.name: Donorbox

entry.string: Donorbox enables quick and simple donations by credit card. Click this button to make a donation with Donorbox:

section.entry: Donorbox omogućuje brzo i jednostavno doniranje kreditnom karticom. Pritisnite ovaj gumb za donaciju putem Donorbox-a:

section.name: Bitcoin

entry.string: Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Bitcoin:

section.entry: Molim skenirajte ili kliknite na QR kod ili kopirajte adresu za donaciju Bitcoina:

entry.string: This address also accepts Bitcoin Cash and other forks.

section.entry: Ova adresa također prima i Bitcoin Cash te druge inačice.

section.name: Ethereum

entry.string: Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Ethereum:

section.entry: Molim skenirajte ili kliknite na QR kod ili kopirajte adresu za donaciju Ethereuma:

entry.string: This address also accepts Ether Classic and ERC20 tokens.

section.entry: Ova adresa također prima i Ether Classic ili ERC20 tokene.

section.name: SEPA

entry.string: You can donate by making an electronic transfer to the following account:

section.entry: Možete donirati i elektronskim transferom na sljedeći račun:

section.name: Video Downloader

entry.string: Automatically download URLs copied to clipboard

section.entry: Automatski downloadaj URLove kopirane u clipboard

section.name: Configuration

entry.string: Select the folder to save downloaded video files to

section.entry: Izaberi mapu za spremanje downloadanih video datoteka

section.name: Errors

entry.string: This URL is not supported or not a video page URL!

section.entry: Ovaj URL nije podržan ili nije URL stranice sa videom!

entry.string: You are already downloading this video!

Some required video decoders could not be found. Video files cannot be added to the joblist for conversion to audio files.
Please install FFmpeg or avconv to fix this problem!

section.entry:
Potrebne video dekodere nije moguće pronaći. Video datoteke se ne mogu dodati na listu poslova za pretvorbu u audio datoteke.
Instalirajte FFmpeg ili avconv da biste riješili ovaj problem!

section.name: Configuration

entry.string: Show Logs tab in main window
Select the folder for saving log files

section.entry: Izaberi mapu za spremanje log datoteka

entry.string: Save conversion logs with audio files

section.entry: Spremi logove konverzije sa audio datotekama

section.name: Configuration

entry.string: Only for conversions running longer than

section.entry: Samo za konverzije koje traju dulje od
